recipes.name: Chicken Marinade
recipes.ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
recipes.description: Combine olive oil, soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger, black pepper, and lemon juice in a bowl. Add chicken breasts, ensuring they are fully coated. Marinate for at least 30 minutes. Grill on medium heat until cooked through.
